definition: Thermosphere mass density at the GRACE-FO satellite locations
description: This product contains thermosphere mass density at the GRACE-FO satellite locations
variables_table:
"Field name","Type","Dimension","Unit","Contents"
"time","CDF_EPOCH","1","ms","Observation time (UTC)"
"altitude","CDF_REAL8","1","m","Observation altitude (GRS80)"
"latitude","CDF_REAL8","1","deg","Observation geodetic latitude"
"longitude","CDF_REAL8","1","deg","Observation longitude "
"local_solar_time","CDF_REAL8","1","h","Local solar time"
"density","CDF_REAL8","1","kg/m3","Mass density"
"density_orbitmean","CDF_REAL8","1","kg/m3","Orbit average of mass density (implemented as moving average)"
"validity_flag","CDF_INT1","1","-","0 = nominal data, 1 = anomalous data"
"validity_flag_orbitmean","CDF_INT1","1","-","0 = nominal data, 1 = anomalous data"
